title: Bernice
description:
The death of a larger than life woman leaves behind an equally huge hole in the hearts of those who knew her, a hole only made deeper and darker by the unanswered questions and mystery surrounding her sudden death. This sudden event causes those closest to her to question just how well they really knew Bernice. A drama that explores grief and the social criticism of its time - Summary by Inkell

Cast List:
Mr. Allen, Bernice’s Father: Beeswaxcandle
Abbie: Claudia Caldi
Craig Norris, Bernice’s Husband: Larry Wilson
Laura (Mrs. Kirby), Craig’s Sister: rrushme
Margaret Pierce, Bernice’s Friend: Stunning
